Oggetto: Re: [junit] Problem=
 when installation of a last version =E2=80=9Cjunit4.9b2=E2=80=9D!!

Hi Ema=
nuela,

you have a problem in your CLASSPATH, in the name of your JAR file.=

You typed "junit4.9b2.jar" but it must be "junit-4.9b2.jar".

Once you fix=
 this in your CLASSPATH variable and restart all the command line 
consoles=
 (in case you have any of them opened while you do the fix), you should 
be=
 up and running.

Bogdan
